This Shiny application is part of the Developing Data Products Coursera course project:

https://www.coursera.org/learn/data-products/

It was used a dataset provided by the Brazilian government on the internet service offered by different companies.
(Available at: http://dados.gov.br/dataset/resultado-consolidado-da-pesquisa-banda-larga-fixa)

Statistics extracted from this dataset are displayed graphically through this shiny app.

The code is available at https://github.com/mmondelli/datasciencecoursera/blob/gh-pages/Data_Products/Project/

An R presentation with additional information is available at https://mmondelli.github.io/datasciencecoursera/Data_Products/Project/presentation.html.

October 12, 2017.
